column177:
12/Feb/25 4:11 PM;Katey_harris@swifttrans.com;AS400 SWIFT

WITH NumberedEvents AS ( SELECT TRIM(TRTRLR) AS Trailer_Num, TRIM(TRORD#) AS Order_Num, TRDISP AS Dispatch_Num, TRIM(TRUNIT) AS Unit, JOJOB AS Job_Name, JOPGM AS Create_Program, CASE WHEN JODATE IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(JODATE) = 6 THEN DATE(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(JODATE, 1, 2) || '/' || SUBSTR(JODATE, 3, 2) || '/' || SUBSTR(JODATE, 5, 2), 'MM/DD/YY')) ELSE NULL END AS Job_Date, JOTIME AS Job_Time, SUBSTR(JODATE, 1, 2) || '/' || SUBSTR(JODATE, 3, 2) || '/' || SUBSTR(JODATE, 5, 2) AS Job_Date_Str, CASE WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(TRIM(CHAR(JOTIME)), ',', '')) = 6 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(TRIM(CHAR(JOTIME)), ',', ''), 1, 2) || ':' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(TRIM(CHAR(JOTIME)), ',', ''), 3, 2) || ':' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(TRIM(CHAR(JOTIME)), ',', ''), 5, 2) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(TRIM(CHAR(JOTIME)), ',', '')) = 5 THEN '0' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(TRIM(CHAR(JOTIME)), ',', ''), 1, 1) || ':' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(TRIM(CHAR(JOTIME)), ',', ''), 2, 2) || ':' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(TRIM(CHAR(JOTIME)), ',', ''), 4, 2) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(TRIM(CHAR(JOTIME)), ',', '')) = 4 THEN '00:' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(TRIM(CHAR(JOTIME)), ',', ''), 1, 2) || ':' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(TRIM(CHAR(JOTIME)), ',', ''), 3, 2) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(TRIM(CHAR(JOTIME)), ',', '')) = 3 THEN '0' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(TRIM(CHAR(JOTIME)), ',', ''), 1, 1) || ':' || '0' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(TRIM(CHAR(JOTIME)), ',', ''), 2, 1) || ':' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(TRIM(CHAR(JOTIME)), ',', ''), 3, 1) ELSE '00:00:00' END AS Job_Time_Str, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TRTRLR ORDER BY DATE(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(JODATE, 1, 2) || '/' || SUBSTR(JODATE, 3, 2) || '/' || SUBSTR(JODATE, 5, 2), 'MM/DD/YY')), REPLACE(TRIM(CHAR(JOTIME)), ',', '') ) AS Row_Num FROM IESR7FL48.DSPTRLLOG WHERE CASE WHEN JODATE IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(JODATE) = 6 THEN DATE(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(JODATE, 1, 2) || '/' || SUBSTR(JODATE, 3, 2) || '/' || SUBSTR(JODATE, 5, 2), 'MM/DD/YY')) ELSE NULL END >= CURRENT DATE - 2 YEARS -- last 2 years based on Job_Date ) SELECT NE1.Trailer_Num, NE1.Order_Num, NE1.Dispatch_Num, NE1.Unit, NE1. Job_Name, NE1.Create_Program, NE2.Unit AS Prev_Unit, NE1.Row_Num, NE1.Job_Date, TIMESTAMP_FORMAT(NE1.Job_Date_Str || ' ' || NE1.Job_Time_Str, 'MM/DD/YY HH24:MI:SS') AS Job_DateTime, CASE WHEN NE1.Unit IS NOT NULL AND NE1.Unit <> '' AND (NE2.Unit IS NULL OR NE2.Unit = '' OR NE1.Row_Num = 1) THEN 'Attach' WHEN (NE1.Unit IS NULL OR NE1.Unit = '') AND (NE2.Unit IS NOT NULL AND NE2.Unit <> '') THEN 'Detach' ELSE 'Other' END AS Event_Type FROM NumberedEvents NE1 LEFT JOIN NumberedEvents NE2 ON NE1.Trailer_Num = NE2.Trailer_Num AND NE1.Row_Num = NE2.Row_Num + 1 WHERE --(NE1.Unit <> NE2.Unit OR (NE1.Unit IS NULL AND NE2.Unit IS NOT NULL) OR (NE1.Unit IS NOT NULL AND NE2.Unit IS NULL) OR (NE1.Unit = '' AND NE2.Unit <> '') OR (NE1.Unit <> '' AND NE2.Unit = '') OR NE1.Row_Num = 1) --AND NE1.Trailer_Num = 'R22160' ORDER BY Row_Num, Job_DateTime;;;;
column178:
12/Feb/25 4:11 PM;Katey_harris@swifttrans.com;KNX SQL Prod
---KNX Trailer Attaches/Detaches
SELECT *
,CASEÂ 
Â  Â  Â  Â  WHEN Unit IS NOT NULL AND Unit <> '' AND (Prev_Unit IS NULL OR Prev_Unit = '' OR Row_Num = 1) THEN 'Attach'
Â  Â  Â  Â  WHEN (Unit IS NULL OR Unit = '') AND (Prev_Unit IS NOT NULL AND Prev_Unit <> '') THEN 'Detach'
Â  Â  Â  Â  ELSE 'Other'
Â  Â  END as Event_Type
FROM
(
SELECTÂ 
TRIM(TRTRLR) as Trailer_Num,
TRIM(TRORD#) as Order_Num,
TRDISP as Dispatch_Num,
TRIM(TRUNIT) as Unit,
JOJOB as Job_Name,---method
JOPGM as Create_Program,---ways to attach to empty trailer
CASEÂ 
WHEN ISDATE(STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/')) = 1Â 
THEN CONVERT(DATE, STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/'), 1)
ELSE NULL
END as Job_Date,
JOTIME as Job_Time,
Â  Â  Â  Â  CAST(CONCAT(
Â  Â  Â  Â  CASEÂ 
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  WHEN ISDATE(STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/')) = 1Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR, STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/'), 1)
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ELSE NULL
Â  Â  Â  Â  END, ' ',Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â  STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CAST(JOTIME AS VARCHAR), 6), 3, 0, ':'), 6, 0, ':')
Â  Â  Â  Â  ) AS DATETIME) as Job_DateTime,
TRTRST as Trailer_Status,
TRDV# as Division_Num,
LAG(TRUNIT) OVER (PARTITION BY TRTRLR ORDER BY CAST(CONCAT(
Â  Â  Â  Â  CASEÂ 
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  WHEN ISDATE(STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/')) = 1Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR, STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/'), 1)
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ELSE NULL
Â  Â  Â  Â  END, ' ',Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â  STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CAST(JOTIME AS VARCHAR), 6), 3, 0, ':'), 6, 0, ':')
Â  Â  Â  Â  ) AS DATETIME), TRDISP) as Prev_Unit,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TRTRLR ORDER BY CAST(CONCAT(
Â  Â  Â  Â  CASEÂ 
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  WHEN ISDATE(STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/')) = 1Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR, STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/'), 1)
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ELSE NULL
Â  Â  Â  Â  END, ' ',Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â  STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CAST(JOTIME AS VARCHAR), 6), 3, 0, ':'), 6, 0, ':')
Â  Â  Â  Â  ) AS DATETIME), TRDISP) as Row_Num
FROM [KNX_pSTAGE].[dbo].[v_bnne_all_dsptrllog_stg]
WHEREÂ 
CASEÂ 
WHEN ISDATE(STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/')) = 1Â 
THEN CONVERT(DATE, STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/'), 1)
ELSE NULL
END >= DATEADD(Year, -2, GETDATE()) -- last 2 years based on Job_Date
) TrailerEvents
WHERE (Unit <> Prev_Unit OR (Unit IS NULL AND Prev_Unit IS NOT NULL) OR (Unit IS NOT NULL AND Prev_Unit IS NULL) OR (Unit = '' AND Prev_Unit <> '') OR (Unit <> '' AND Prev_Unit = '') OR Row_Num = 1)
--AND Trailer_Num = '81142'
ORDER BY Trailer_Num, Job_DateTime;;;

18/Apr/25 2:06 PM;Katey_harris@swifttrans.com;updated knx query including contact detailsÂ 
---KNX Trailer Attaches/Detaches
SELECT j.Trailer_Num
,Order_Num
,Dispatch_Num
,j.Unit
,CASE WHEN cninit IS NOT NULL THEN cninit ELSE Initials END as Inititals
,Job_Name
,[User]
,[User_Name]
,Create_Program
,Job_DateTime
,Trailer_Status
,Event_Type
,[cnrest]
FROM
(
SELECTÂ 
Trailer_Num
,Order_Num
,Dispatch_Num
,Unit
,Initials
,Job_Name
,[User]
,[User_Name]
,Create_Program
,Job_DateTime
,Trailer_Status
,CASEÂ 
Â  Â  Â  Â  WHEN Unit IS NOT NULL AND Unit <> '' AND (Prev_Unit IS NULL OR Prev_Unit = '' OR Row_Num = 1) THEN 'Attach'
Â  Â  Â  Â  WHEN (Unit IS NULL OR Unit = '') AND (Prev_Unit IS NOT NULL AND Prev_Unit <> '') THEN 'Detach'
Â  Â  Â  Â  ELSE 'Other'
Â  Â  END as Event_Type
FROM
(
SELECTÂ 
TRIM(TRTRLR) as Trailer_Num,
TRIM(TRORD#) as Order_Num,
TRDISP as Dispatch_Num,
TRIM(TRUNIT) as Unit,
COALESCE(USRINT, TRUPDI) as Initials,---initials of user or service acct last updated init
JOJOB as Job_Name,---method/Device Name
JOUSER as [User],
USRNME as [User_Name],
JOPGM as Create_Program,---program/ways to attach to empty trailer
CASEÂ 
WHEN ISDATE(STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/')) = 1Â 
THEN CONVERT(DATE, STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/'), 1)
ELSE NULL
END as Job_Date,
JOTIME as Job_Time,
Â  Â  Â  Â  DATEADD(MINUTE, DATEDIFF(MINUTE, 0,Â 
Â  Â  CAST(
CONCAT(
CASEÂ 
WHEN ISDATE(STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/')) = 1Â 
THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR, STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/'), 1)Â 
ELSE NULLÂ 
END,Â 
' ',Â 
STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CAST(JOTIME AS VARCHAR), 6), 3, 0, ':'), 6, 0, ':')
) AS DATETIME
)), 0) AS Job_DateTime,
TRTRST as Trailer_Status,
LAG(TRUNIT) OVER (PARTITION BY TRTRLR ORDER BY CAST(CONCAT(
Â  Â  Â  Â  CASEÂ 
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  WHEN ISDATE(STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/')) = 1Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR, STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/'), 1)
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ELSE NULL
Â  Â  Â  Â  END, ' ',Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â  STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CAST(JOTIME AS VARCHAR), 6), 3, 0, ':'), 6, 0, ':')
Â  Â  Â  Â  ) AS DATETIME), JOSEQN) as Prev_Unit,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TRTRLR ORDER BY CAST(CONCAT(
Â  Â  Â  Â  CASEÂ 
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  WHEN ISDATE(STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/')) = 1Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR, STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/'), 1)
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ELSE NULL
Â  Â  Â  Â  END, ' ',Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â  STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CAST(JOTIME AS VARCHAR), 6), 3, 0, ':'), 6, 0, ':')
Â  Â  Â  Â  ) AS DATETIME), JOSEQN) as Row_Num
FROM [KNX_pSTAGE].[dbo].[v_bnne_all_dsptrllog_stg] dsptrllog
LEFT JOIN [KNX_pSTAGE].[dbo].[v_bnne_all_mstcontl_stg] mstcontl ON dsptrllog.JOUSER=mstcontl.USRID
WHEREÂ 
CASEÂ 
WHEN ISDATE(STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/')) = 1Â 
THEN CONVERT(DATE, STUFF(STUFF(JODATE, 3, 0, '/'), 6, 0, '/'), 1)
ELSE NULL
END >= '2023-01-01' -- last 2 years based on Job_Date
AND TRIM(JOPGM) <> 'ES3RALLSAT'
AND TRIM(JOPGM) <>'STAT'
AND TRIM(TRUNIT) <> 'RESVD'
AND TRIM(TRUNIT) <> 'BRK'
AND TRIM(JOUSER) <> 'QAUDIT'
) TrailerEvents
WHERE --(Unit <> Prev_Unit OR (Unit IS NULL AND Prev_Unit IS NOT NULL) OR (Unit IS NOT NULL AND Prev_Unit IS NULL) OR Row_Num = 1)
CASEÂ 
Â  Â  Â  Â  WHEN Unit IS NOT NULL AND Unit <> '' AND (Prev_Unit IS NULL OR Prev_Unit = '' OR Row_Num = 1) THEN 'Attach'
Â  Â  Â  Â  WHEN (Unit IS NULL OR Unit = '') AND (Prev_Unit IS NOT NULL AND Prev_Unit <> '') THEN 'Detach'
Â  Â  Â  Â  ELSE 'Other'
Â  Â  END IN('Attach','Detach')
) j
---Freightbox Contact
LEFT JOINÂ 
(SELECT DISTINCT [cnunit] as [unit]
,TRIM([cnord#]) as [order]
,CAST(CONCAT(
CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), [dt], 120), -- Formats the DATE field as 'yyyy-MM-dd'
' ',
LEFT(RIGHT('0000' + LTRIM(RTRIM([cntime])), 4), 2) + ':' + RIGHT(LTRIM(RTRIM([cntime])), 2) -- Trims and formats time as 'hh:mm'
) AS DATETIME
) AS contact_dttm
,[cncode]
,[cnloc]
,[cnsnm]
,[cninit]
,[cnrest]
,TRIM(SUBSTRING(cnrest, 9, 6)) AS trailer_num
,SUBSTRING(cnrest, 23, 11) AS method
,SUBSTRING(cnrest, 53, 4) AS [event]
FROM [KNX_pSTAGE].[dbo].[v_bnne_all_contact_stg] cntct
JOIN [KNX_pSTAGE].[dbo].[v_etl_valid_date] dt ON cntct.cndate=dt.dt_dec_yyyyddd
WHEREÂ  [dt]>= '2023-01-01'
Â  AND (cninit IN('@FB','FBX','24','@MC') OR TRIM(SUBSTRING(cnrest, 23, 11))='KCALL')
)cntct ON j.Trailer_Num = cntct.trailer_num and j.Job_DateTime = cntct.contact_dttm
WHERE j.Trailer_Num='88987'
ORDER BY Job_DateTime;;;

Counts from Contacts match what already have, but are missing the USTAGEHP ones (though those counts are not part of the total attach and detach from AS400, so unclear if needed). He is to share Alteryx workflow, so I can attempt replication for Swift. Exhausted all attempts to find query logic despite working with Josh Grow and John Benson to identify logic with exclusions, and creating groups to group the attach/detach event asÂ

â€¢ Â  Â McLeod

column184:
14/May/25 3:10 PM;Katey_harris@swifttrans.com;SWIFT AS400

Â 

Â 

SELECT DISTINCT CNORD# AS ORDER#, CNDISP AS DISPATCH, CNCALL AS CALL_ORDER, CNUNIT AS UNIT#, COALESCE(TCTRLR, TRIM(SUBSTRING(cnrest, 9, 6))) AS TRAILER_NUM, EVENT_DTTM, CALL_ACTION, CASE WHEN CNINIT ='24' and (CNREST like '%DROP%' or CNREST like '%DRP%') then 'Macro 24 Drop' WHEN CNINIT = '@FB' and (CNREST like '%DROP%' or CNREST like '%DRP%') then 'Freightbox Drop' WHEN CNINIT = '24' and (CNREST like '%P/U%' or CNREST like '%PU%') then 'Macro 24 Attach' WHEN CNINIT = '@FB' and (CNREST like '%P/U%' or CNREST like '%PU%') then 'Freightbox Attach' WHEN CNCODE='K' AND CNINIT not in ('24','@FB') and (CNREST like '%DROP%' or CNREST like '%DRP%') then 'K-Call Drop Swift User' WHEN CNCODE='K' AND CNINIT not in ('24','@FB') and (CNREST like '%DROP%' or CNREST like '%DRP%') then 'K-Call Attach Swift User' ELSE '' END AS CALL_TYPE FROM ( SELECT CNORD#, CNDISP, CNCALL, CNLOC, CNSNM, CASE WHEN CNDATE IS NOT NULL THEN DATE( TO_DATE( DIGITS(CNDATE), 'YYYYDDD' ) ) ELSE NULL END AS CONTACT_DATE, CASE WHEN CNDATE IS NOT NULL AND CNTIME IS NOT NULL THEN TIMESTAMP( DATE( TO_DATE( DIGITS(CNDATE), 'YYYYDDD' ) ), SUBSTR(CNTIME, 1, 2) || ':' || SUBSTR(CNTIME, 3, 2) || ':00' ) ELSE NULL END AS EVENT_DTTM, CNCODE, CNUNIT, CASE WHEN CNREST like '%KCALL%' THEN 'K' WHEN CNREST like '%Freightbox%' THEN '@FB' WHEN CNREST like '%Mcleod%' THEN '@MC' WHEN CNREST like '%Macro 24%' THEN '24' ELSE CNINIT END as CNINIT, CNREST, TCTRLR, TCORD, TCDISP, TCUNIT, CASE WHEN CNREST like '%P/U%' THEN 'ATTACH' WHEN CNREST like '%PU%' THEN 'ATTACH' WHEN CNREST like '%DROP%' THEN 'DROP' WHEN CNREST like '%DRP%' THEN 'DROP' ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END AS CALL_ACTION FROM IESR7FILE.CONTACT LEFT JOIN IESR7FILE.TRCONTCT ON IESR7FILE.CONTACT.CNORD# = IESR7FILE.TRCONTCT.TCORD AND IESR7FILE.CONTACT.CNDISP = IESR7FILE.TRCONTCT.TCDISP WHERE CNDATE > '2025000' AND (TRIM(SUBSTRING(cnrest, 23, 11)) in('KCALL', 'Freightbox', 'Mcleod', 'Macro 24') or CNCODE='K') AND LEFT(CNORD#,1) not in ('C') AND LEFT (CNUNIT,1) not in ('T') AND CNORD# not in ('',' ') AND (CNREST like '%P/U%' OR CNREST like '%PU%' OR CNREST like '%DROP%' OR CNREST like '%DRP%') ) cnct;;;

-Identify by order commodity code.... IESR7FILE.ORDER where ORCOMC in ('0707', 'POS')

-Identify by Event Flag...IESR7FILE.EVFLAG where FLGCOM = 'EMPTYS'

column177:
22/Apr/25 1:49 PM;Ashley_cleavenger@swifttrans.com;Comparing all non-rev loads in AS400 vs [pMART].[dbo].[v_pgg_dispatch_revenue_asset].

AS400 Query:Â 

Select ord.orodr#, orcom.orcomc, codetag.cdf6c2, codetag.cdf7c2, evflag.FLGCOM from iesr7file.codetag codetag inner join iesr7file.order ord on trim(ord.ORBILL) = trim(codetag.cdf7c2) and ord.orecdt = '2025098' left join iesr7file.evflag evflag on ord.orodr# = evflag.FLGORD and FLGCOM = 'EMPTYS' Left join iesr7file.order orcom on ord.orodr# = orcom.orodr# and orcom.orcomc in ('0707','POS') where CDF6C2 = 'NONREV' and CDDLS2 <> 'D'

Â 

MSSQL

SELECT Â [ordr_nbr],
non_rev_flg
Â  FROM [pMART].[dbo].[v_pgg_dispatch_revenue_asset] where empty_call_dt = '2025-04-08'Â 
Â  GROUP BY ordr_nbr,
Â  non_rev_flg;;;
column178:
10/Jun/25 8:55 AM;Ashley_cleavenger@swifttrans.com;Per Cory the logic for the non_rev_flg in pMART.dbo.v_pgg_dispatch_revenue_asset is:Â 
 * If the Order Number starts with 'DH', then the flag is a 'Y'
 * If the Order Number starts with 'CM', then the flag is a 'Y'.
 * If the BillTo Code is a 'Swift' BillTo (comes from pCORE.dbo.v_ref_swift_billto), then the flag is a 'Y'
 * Everything else is an 'N';;;
